name: The Commute
description:
The year is 2020. A global pandemic has arrived in Central London. Disregarding the situation, some people still do not want to wear masks. You play as one of them, trying to get to an important job interview.

Gameplay

Try not to get infected. This will reset your progress! Keep an eye on the infection indicator on the top-right of the screen.

More Information

This game has been developed within 48 hours during London GameDev Summer Jam. Coding, pixel art and sound design all done by me.

Link to source code: https://github.com/bitbrain/commute

Tools used

- Godot Engine

- Aseprite

- Ableton

Report Bugs

🐛 report any bugs here: https://github.com/bitbrain/commute/issues
